channel.title: [474]ViX[474]
channel.description:
Okay, so I finally got the logout button to log the player out, except, now I get this error.
[code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source) at Player.directFlushOutStream(Player.java:305) at Processor.tick(Processor.java:36) at Server.<init>(Server.java:25) at Server.main(Server.java:12) [/code]
Here's line 305 in the Player class:
[code] public void directFlushOutStream() throws IOException { out.write(outStream.buffer, 0, outStream.currentOffset); outStream.currentOffset = 0; } [/code]
Could anyone help me? :/

item.title: [474]ViX[474]
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Okay, so I finally got the logout button to log the player out, except, now I get this error.

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
        at Player.directFlushOutStream(Player.java:305)
        at Processor.tick(Processor.java:36)
        at Server.<init>(Server.java:25)
        at Server.main(Server.java:12)

Hereâ€™s line 305 in the Player class:

	public void directFlushOutStream() throws IOException {
		out.write(outStream.buffer, 0, outStream.currentOffset);
		outStream.currentOffset = 0;
	}

Could anyone help me?

Read full topic
